definition: to live as a parasite/doing nothing to earn one's keep
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])

sentences.english: You can't always sponge on me, but have to work.
sentences.chinese: 你不能老在我這裏吃閒飯，你也得自己乾點兒什麼。

sentences.english: She looketh well to the ways of her household, and eateth not the bread of idleness.
sentences.chinese: 他觀察家務，並不吃閒飯。

sentences.english: She watches over the affairs of her household and does not eat the bread of idleness.
sentences.chinese: 她觀察家務，並不吃閒飯。

sentences.english: More Garda incompetence. Is this why we pay our taxes?
sentences.chinese: 越來越多吃閒飯的警察。我們納稅就是幹這個嗎？

sentences.english: A strong man is not willing to be a loafer or sponger.
sentences.chinese: 身強力壯的人誰也不願吃閒飯。

sentences.english: I look down on those who eat the bread of idleness.
sentences.chinese: 我看不起那些吃閒飯的人。

sentences.english: Why does the farmer keep you around anyhow?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼農夫留你在這吃閒飯？
